name: CreateLeadEntry
description:
Create a new lead entry in the Entrata system.

Use this tool to submit a new lead's information to the Entrata system for a specified organization. This action is suitable when new leads need to be captured and stored in the system for follow-up or record-keeping.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain associated with the client organization in Entrata.

parameters.name: lead_information
parameters.description: An array of JSON objects representing the new lead's details to be added. Each JSON object should contain properties relevant to the lead, such as name, contact information, and any other required fields.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number for paginated responses. Use this to specify which page to retrieve when dealing with paginated data.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: number_of_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of items to be returned per page in the paginated response.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: include_pagination_links
parameters.description: Flag to include pagination links in the response body. Use '1' to enable and '0' to disable.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: The page number of paginated respons.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: X-Send-Pagination-Links
parameters.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.
